Layer.Name: Lemonade Timer
Layer.FirstCommand: %function(self) self:hidden(1) if not Lemonade.Initialized then Lemonade.Timer = self Lemonade:Initialize() self:queuecommand('Detect') end end
Layer.DetectCommand: %function(self) if GAMESTATE:GetExternal(57) == 1 then self:sleep(1/2) self:queuecommand('Check') end self:sleep(1/60) self:queuecommand('Detect') end
Layer.CheckCommand:
%function(self) if Lemonade:Check_Write() then Debug('[Lemonade] Program ID \''.. GAMESTATE:GetExternal(59)..'\' took too long to read, clearing.') Lemonade:Clear_Write() end
end
